messages.message: If I try to delete `log.txt` in that folder, instead of deleting the file, it just deletes the last line from that file

This is the weirdest thing ever!! It doesn’t happen to copies of the file. And it also doesn’t happen if you download and re-upload the same file. Umm I also may have screwed up our ability to reproduce this - I just deleted the file. I was testing it with the go fileservice and it just deleted it…
I have a the logs from when I reproduced this against the python filesservice, but I can’t make much sense of them.
